entry.title: The Other Side of Waiting in Vain
entry.summary:
Author: Natsuzu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,953Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 404

Summary: Soulmates are always guaranteed to meet each other, so it should have been impossible for your soulmate to die a complete stranger. Still heartbroken nine years after his death, you move back to Gotham City and find yourself falling for the vigilante named Red Hood. It feels like falling in love with your soulmate all over again, but it’s impossible for the dead to come back to life… right?Or: you have a pain-sharing soulmate bond with Jason Todd, but neither of you know you're soulmates

entry.title: everything leads back to you
entry.summary:
Author: marmilyde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,139Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Before everything, all they had was each other. Sharing squished sandwiches, stolen snacks, patching each other up after a rough day. It was better than being alone. That is, until his inevitable “death”.Years later, with the job Bruce offered everything seemed okay enough. Until Gotham began to crumble under Scarecrow’s terror—with the help of another masked soldier.Revenge is all that’s in his soul—etched deeply like the scars that never faded. Love won’t be enough to save them this time. They hold onto each other for just a little longer, even if it all burns.

entry.title: Chromatic silence
entry.summary:
Author: corpsedogs

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,622Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 103

Summary: And then.. it happens. Your world explodes.Just a single brief touch. It didn’t even last a second, but that’s all it took.The color rushes in and you inhale sharply.Jason.. he was all red and shadows, his hoodie the deepest rust and his skin warm in the golden lamplight. You blink, nearly stumbling as you grab the railing like it’ll hold your sanity in place.But then you looked at Jason, staring at the distance like nothing happened.You internally panicked.He doesn’t see it.He doesn’t feel it. A.K.A The reader’s soulmate power is to see colors for the first time when she touches her soulmate. When she met Jason, her world bursts to color but not his. She fell for him quietly, but she’s not his and she’s torn between waiting for his colors to come or moving on.

entry.title: Devoted Little Thing
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,870Chapters: 21/21Kudos: 654

Summary: After the death of your boyfriend, Jason Todd, your life has never been the same. You abandon everything you've ever known: your job working for Batman as a detective, your home, your friends. That is until three years after his death, your life is saved by a mysterious vigilante calling himself the Red Hood.You assume it was a one-off; that the infamous anti-hero just happened to be in the right place at the right time. But you're finding his calling card everywhere. He's around every single corner―you can't seem to get rid of him. The mystery of his identity brings you back to Bruce in hopes of finding out who he is. But as intimidating as the Red Hood is, with his blurry morals and all, you can't help but find yourself falling for him. Maybe he's the answer to your loneliness.

entry.summary:
Author: Imsbdl

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,021Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: A kid goes missing and suddenly your drowning in memorys of the broken streets that raised you. It is a reacurring story, swept under files at GCPD never to see the light of day. Never to reunite weeping mothers and kids toghther, the malice in this city girps at the children so fast. Throwing them into a world they have no place in. Crime Alley. It cant happen again...You dont know how little you matter until your all alone. Gripped by a powerfull men as the world around you crumbles. entry.summary:
Author: Xivkyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,301Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 16

Summary: After being an experiment to Hugo Strange for the majority of your life you finally escape. The trauma of your time there follows you as you remember the screams and death all around you. entry.title: The Theory of Liminal Happiness
entry.summary:
Author: i88

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,592Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 91

Summary: Jason Todd has the worst and best luck of anyone he knows. He got caught stealing Batman's tires, but then he was adopted by Bruce Wayne. Then Robin, but then Joker. Dead. Resurrected. Replaced. Red Hood. Redemption. On and on with his fucking luck until in the most ridiculous of twists he is the only person on earth who can help a young witch regain her powers after her literal demon of an ex-boyfriend stole them. All she needs from Jason is his hair, his blood, and his virginity. At least she doesn't need him to die again.
